alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Jackson; Putnam; Smith (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 2:47PM CDT until July 07 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Smith County in Middle Tennessee... De Kalb County in Middle Tennessee... Jackson County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 246 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Red Boiling Springs to Dowelltown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Smithville, Gainesboro, Baxter, Gordonsville, Hickman, Dowelltown, Liberty, Center Hill Lake, Whitleyville, Granville and Edgar Evans State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 260 and 280. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
